column3: Developed a graphical ATM simulation application using Java Swing. The user interface is designed to be simple and user-friendly, ensuring ease of use for all users.
Developed a console-based Multiple Choice Question (MCQ) game using C++. The game is designed to be simple and engaging, making it an effective tool for testing and improving general knowledge.
Developed a FlappyBird application using Java Swing. The user interface is designed to be simple and user-friendly, ensuring ease of use for all users.
